properties.name: Sistan Suture Zone, Zahedan County, Sistan and Baluchestan Province, Iran
properties.description:
Sistan Suture Zone, Zahedan County, Sistan and Baluchestan Province, Iran

Type: 397

Location: Iran

NS-trending area between the Lut to the west and Afghan blocks in which there are major fractures and extensive areas of volcanics intercalated with sedimentary rocks.

View on Mindat.org
